item.title: MAIN DECK CARGO SIGNALING SYSTEM – TOTAL SYSTEM INOP

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided access to main deck cargo compartment is prohibited in flight.

numlitem.para: Access to main deck cargo compartment is prohibited in flight.
Hazardous material that requires in flight access is prohibited.

note.para: Agriculture in-flight spraying may be accomplished by the Flight Crew from the stairs.

placard.para: Placard below Captains PFD on P-1-1 panel: "MAIN DK CARGO SIG SYS INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
